title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama models directly into LangChain LLM, embeddings, and tool chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick chatting and model ops from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation stack using Ollama, Chroma, and Streamlit.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize, translate, or continue writing notes using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama chat into your workspace threads with per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API with Tokio-based async client.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Cross-platform desktop UI (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for ollama pull.
